text: Rudy Gobert (born June 26, 1992) is a French professional basketball player. He plays for the Minnesota Timberwolves of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He has also played for the Utah Jazz. He also plays on the French national basketball team in the international competitions. On March 11, 2020, it was discovered that Gobert tested positive for the Coronavirus disease 2019. On July 6, 2022, the Jazz traded Gobert to the Minnesota Timberwolves in exchange for Patrick Beverley, Malik Beasley, Jarred Vanderbilt, Leandro Bolmaro, and the rights to Walker Kessler along with four first-round picks and a 2026 first-round pick swap. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Competitors at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:French basketball players Category:Medalists at the 2020 Summer Olympics Category:Minnesota Timberwolves players Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:People from Aisne Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de-France Category:Utah Jazz players
title: Rudy Gobert
